name: Champion of Athena: The Text Adventure
name_original: Champion of Athena: The Text Adventure
description:
Champion of Athena is a text-based adventure game based in a land of Greco-Roman mythology. Guided by the Greek Goddess of Wisdom, the Gladiator fights valiantly to get revenge on the rigidly brutal Empress of her land.

Credits:

  • Dan Pevny - Director, Project manager, Lead game designer, Story writer
  • Jelani Haynes-Prescott - Artist, Game designer, Story writer
  • Dan Demartino - Lead programmer, Game designer
